name: YOU'RE BLÊ̷̥̜̮̬EḐ̵̥̳̳̺̜̇̈́̏̅̃́͗̇IN̷͖̪͙͕̘͔͛̿̀̑͜͠G NOW
description:
Survive a hellish purgatory as a demonic entity pursues you while you unravel the conspiratorial circumstances of your death.

DISCLAIMER

This game contains flashing imagery, and distorted or loud audio.

It may cause discomfort and trigger seizures for people with photosensitive epilepsy.

Any images and audio played throughout the duration of your playthrough is 100% fictional.
